languages.text: Мостик похож на поле битвы — пол устлан трупами, когитаторы повреждены, а находящиеся в помещении люди едва стоят на ногах. Лекари в масках пакуют посиневшие трупы, техноматы наспех латают разорванные трубы, а уцелевшие офицеры пытаются восстановить работу сохранившихся когитаторов.

traits.locale_text: На мостике проводится служба по погибшим офицерам — труппы аккуратно сложены в ряд и покрыты белыми саванами, а проповедних ходит между усопшими, окуривая тела и читая заупокойную молитву. Большинство старших офицеров отдали жизни, чтобы спасти остальные отсеки корабля, но остатки управляющего состава уже собрались вокруг звездной карты и обсуждают план действий.

languages.text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.
languages.original_text: Мостик похож на поле битвы — пол устлан трупами, когитаторы повреждены, а находящиеся в помещении люди едва стоят на ногах. Лекари в масках пакуют посиневшие трупы, техноматы наспех латают разорванные трубы, а уцелевшие офицеры пытаются восстановить работу сохранившихся когитаторов.

traits.locale_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are packing the pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

Healers in masks are packing the pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

languages.text: El puente parece un campo de batalla. El suelo está lleno de cadáveres, los cogitadores están dañados y la gente del interior apenas se tiene en pie. El personal médico enmascarado está retirando cadáveres pálidos mientras los tecnómatas arreglan apresuradamente las tuberías. Los oficiales supervivientes intentan reparar los cogitadores que quedan.
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

traits.locale_text: El puente parece un campo de batalla. El suelo está lleno de cadáveres, los cogitadores están dañados y la gente del interior apenas se tiene en pie. El personal médico enmascarado está retirando cadáveres pálidos mientras los tecnómatas arreglan apresuradamente las tuberías. Los oficiales supervivientes intentan reparar los cogitadores que quedan.

languages.text: 舰桥看起来就像战场一样——地板上到处散落着尸体，沉思者被损坏，舰桥上的人几乎已经站不住了。戴着面具的医护人员正在把毫无血色的尸体丢进袋子里，技工们则忙着修补破裂的管道，而幸存的军官正在努力让剩余的沉思者恢复运转。
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥看起来就像战场一样——地板上到处散落着尸体，思考器被损坏，舰桥上的人几乎已经站不住了。戴着面具的医护人员正在把毫无血色的尸体丢进袋子里，机械殉道者们则忙着修补破裂的管道，而幸存的军官正在努力让剩余的思考器恢复运转。

languages.text: ブリッジはまるで戦場だ。床には死体が散乱し、考算機は傷だらけで、中にいた人間はかろうじて立っている状態だ。マスクをつけた治療士達が青白い死体を袋に詰め、テクノマット達が破裂したパイプを急いで補修し、生き残った士官達が残りの考算機を再稼働させようと奮闘している。
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジはまるで戦場だ。床には死体が散乱し、考算機は傷だらけで、中にいた人間はかろうじて立っている状態だ。マスクをつけた治療士達が青白い死体を袋に詰め、テクノマット達が破裂したパイプを急いで補修し、生き残った士官達が残りの考算機を再稼働させようと奮闘している。

languages.text: Die Brücke gleicht einem Schlachtfeld – der Boden ist mit Leichen übersät, die Cogitatoren sind beschädigt, und die Menschen im Inneren können kaum noch stehen. Heiler mit Masken sammeln die bleichen Leichen ein, Technomaten flicken eilig die geborstenen Rohre, und die überlebenden Offiziere versuchen, die verbleibenden Cogitatoren wieder zum Laufen zu bringen.
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

languages.text: Entre les cadavres jonchant le sol, les cogitateurs endommagés et les membres d'équipage qui tiennent à peine debout, le pont ressemble à un véritable champ de bataille. Des soigneurs portant des masques mettent des corps pâles dans des sacs, des technomates réparent hâtivement les tuyaux qui ont éclaté, et les officiers survivants essaient de remettre les cogitateurs restants en état de marche.
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

traits.locale_text: Entre les cadavres jonchant le sol, les cogitateurs endommagés et les membres d'équipage qui tiennent à peine debout, le pont ressemble à un véritable champ de bataille. Des soigneurs portant des masques mettent des corps pâles dans des sacs, des technomates réparent hâtivement les tuyaux qui ont éclaté, et les officiers survivants essaient de remettre les cogitateurs restants en état de marche.

languages.text: Köprü, âdeta bir savaş alanını andırıyor. Zemin cesetlerle dolu, kavramsayarlar hasarlı, içerideki insanlar ise zar zor ayakta duruyor. Maskeli şifacılar, renksiz cesetleri topluyor; teknomatlar, alelacele kopan boruları onarıyor; hayatta kalan subaylar ise kalan kavramsayarları tekrar çalışır hâle getirmeye çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: The bridge resembles a battlefield — the floor is strewn with corpses, the cogitators are damaged, and the people inside are barely standing. Healers in masks are bagging up pale corpses, technomats are hastily patching up the ruptured pipes, and the surviving officers are trying to get the remaining cogitators back up and running.

traits.locale_text: Köprü, bir savaş alanını andırıyor. Zemin cesetlerle dolu, kavramsayarlar hasarlı, içerideki insanlar ise zar zor ayakta duruyor. Maskeli şifacılar, renksiz cesetleri topluyor; teknomatonlar, alelacele kopan boruları onarıyor; hayatta kalan subaylar ise kalan kavramsayarları tekrar çalışır hâle getirmeye çalışıyor.
